DOC.brief_summary: Screening of Fabry disease in end-stage renal disease (ESRD) patients on dialysis or transplant in west of France.
DOC.brief_title: Fabry Disease Screening in ESRD Patients in West of France
DOC.detailed_description: Detection of Fabry disease is done by dried blood spot test, in dialyzed and transplanted men, who reached ESRD for vascular or unknown disease and were not previously screened.
DOC.criteria: Men less than 70 years old ESRD treated by dialysis or kidney graft in one of the 4 following regions : Bretagne, Centre, Pays de la Loire and PoitouCharentes For unknown nephropathy OR vascular nephropathy and/or diabetic nephropathy unproved by biopsy Agreeing freely to participate in the study Men less than 18 years old Persons subject to major legal protection (safeguarding justice, guardianship, trusteeship), persons deprived of liberty.
